verbs.description: lee [V: leet] [ARG0: super tucano] pilot lee leet of louisville owns and flies this beautiful short tucano t mk1 the plane is based at bowman field the short tucano is a two - seat turboprop basic trainer used by the royal air forc british ministry of defense ireland
